title: The Cat's meow
creator_credit: National Geographic Society and Oxford Scientific Films
brief_description: A live action cat-and-mouse story about several playful mice, an inquisitive house cat, and his cousin, the alley cat, which is shown as a serious struggle for survival and a comic standoff between lively opponents. Suitable for upper primary level.
